passage_text: Tallan is an uncommonly occurring given name for men. Tallan is an equivalently unusual last name too for all people. (2000 U.S. Census). Below is a charted analysis of the usage of the boy name Tallan and related names. Talon (#555 a year ago) and Talen are the popular varying forms of Tallan (outside Top 1000) .
To know what does your baby name mean, type your baby name or any name in the search box and know the meaning and origin of that name.

[ syll. tal-lan, ta-ll-an ] The baby boy name Tallan has its origins in the Old French language. Tallan is a variant of the name Talon (English). Tallan is not commonly used as a baby boy name. It is not listed within the top 1000. In 2012, among the family of boy names directly related to Tallan, Talon was the most popular. Baby names that sound like Tallan include Talen, Tallon, Tallean, Tallen, Taylan, Taylon, Tellan, Tellen, Tellon, Tellun, Tilen, Tilson, Tiltun, Tolan, Tolen, Tolon, Taelon, Talessin, Telemon, and Tolecan.
